section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2022.*
section.heading: Outreach efforts.

para.text: Beginning on the first Friday after the effective date of this act through September 30, 2022, DC Health shall report to the Council on a weekly basis, and on a biweekly basis from October 1, 2022, through November 30, 2022:
The dates, times, and addresses of where mobile health providers and COVID-19 centers will be available to the public for pediatric immunizations during the next 7 calendar days; and
The number of students served at each site each week.
The information or a link to the information required in subsection (a)(1) of this section shall be widely promoted and posted publicly utilizing:
DCPS, PCSB, and DC Health social media platforms; and
Other means as determined by DC Health.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 25, 2022.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 203 of Back-to-School Safely Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-544, July 27, 2022, 0 DCR 0).
